Package index

Functions

The functions within the ColonyRepr package

KDE_UD_fun()
Determine Utilization Density
KDE_combine_areas_fun()
Function to iteratively combine individual-level kernels to estimate within-colony variation
KDE_contours_fun()
Extract kernel vertices from UD-object
KDE_filter_tracks_fun()
Filter for tracks with sufficient location estimates
KDE_repr_per_retrieval_year_fun()
Function to determine representativeness of data collected up to and including certain retrieval years.
KDE_saturation_curve()
Fit saturation curve model to combined areas

Package data

Data that is used in the package vignettes

Combine
Example output from `KDE_combine_areas_fun()`
Sens_MM
Example data to assess uncertainty of the estimated colony representativeness
contours_all
Data set with all contours of the example tracks
example_tracks
Individual example tracks
mean_smooths
Species specific smoothing parameters
retrieval_year_repr
Example output from `KDE_Repr_per_retrieval_year()`
saturation_curve
Example data as would be returned from `KDE_saturation_curve_fun()`
species_curves_tot_PN
Mutli-species data set for a grouped analysis
